meaning: 1. To land / go ashore; 2. To succeed / pass an exam
description: Literally means 'to go ashore'. Metaphorically used to mean escaping the 'bitter sea' (intense competition) and achieving stability, e.g., passing the civil service exam.

examples.translation: How to succeed in the grad school entrance exam?
Praying for success, may the Koi protect me.
Starting a business is easy, succeeding is hard.
Wish everything goes well! Pass the civil service exam.

examples.chinese: 今年顺心上岸满意岗位
examples.translation: Hope to succeed this year and get a satisfactory job.
